Html:
I am using the ToolTipText part of GMapMarker. There is a line draw from the text balloon onto the exact position on the map, but I don't want the line. But I can't figure out how to get rid of it. 

Each time I update the code I change the background color, and that works, I see my changes. Yet nothing removes that little line. Some hints/help please?
mm, well it's part of default tooltips, you can create custom tooltip with no lines, etc..
